description:
Zoro slashes against the Pacifista Kuma is meet with resistance harder than steel.  Unable to win with his swords he bets everything on a trade.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La douleur de mon ami sera mienne. Zoro se prépare au pire
Nakama no Itami wa Waga Itami: Zoro Kesshi no Tatakai
The Pain of My Crewmates Is My Pain! Zoro`s Desperate Fight!
Боль моих накама – моя боль. Смертельная битва Зоро
仲間の痛みは我が痛み ゾロ決死の戦い
